name: The Patternbase Book
description: The Pattern Base: Over 550 Contemporary Textile & Surface Designs. Author: Kristi O’Meara. The Pattern Base presents textile & surface design by some of the most exciting up-and-coming designers worldwide & points to the way ahead for this vibrant field. The future possibilities of print, pattern & clothing are endless & this book leads the way into that future – it is a wonderful sourcebook for all students, professionals & enthusiasts of textile & fashion design. 368 pgs. Published March 2015.
